metadata.title: CVE-2011-1352 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.description: The PowerVR SGX driver in Android before 2.3.6 allows attackers to gainroot privileges via an application that triggers kernel memory corruptionusing crafted user data to the pvrsrvkm device.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
